name: Crearyborrar
body:
#Welcome to CrearYBorrar-Pages!

Introduction
---
CrearYBorrar is a game created by Mathboy19. It was based off the game at http://www.deseoaprender.com/CrearYBorrar.htm, but was coded from scratch. Programmed in Java, CrearYBorrar is open source and free. Please visit the wiki, or email Mathboy19 for more information.

Downloads
---
For Windows (.exe): [here](https://sites.google.com/site/crearyborrar1/).

Jar File (Java Executable): [here](https://sites.google.com/site/crearyborrar1/jar-file).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
